name: prak-electron
description: Manage your image files duplicates made simple.
author: arancibiajav@gmail.com

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build && electron-builder
scripts.build:docker: npm ci && cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && electron-builder
scripts.docker: docker run --rm -ti --env-file <(env | grep -iE 'DEBUG|NODE_|ELECTRON_|YARN_|NPM_|CI|CIRCLE|TRAVIS_TAG|TRAVIS|TRAVIS_REPO_|TRAVIS_BUILD_|TRAVIS_BRANCH|TRAVIS_PULL_REQUEST_|APPVEYOR_|CSC_|GH_|GITHUB_|BT_|AWS_|STRIP|BUILD_') --env ELECTRON_CACHE="/root/.cache/electron" --env ELECTRON_BUILDER_CACHE="/root/.cache/electron-builder" -v ${PWD}:/project -v ${PWD##*/}-node-modules:/project/node_modules -v ~/.cache/electron:/root/.cache/electron -v ~/.cache/electron-builder:/root/.cache/electron-builder electronuserland/builder:wine npm run build:docker
scripts.release: git push origin master && git push gh master:main
scripts.release:mayor: npx json-bump package.json --mayor && git add package.json && git commit -m 'Bump version' && git push origin master && git push gh master:main
scripts.release:minor: npx json-bump package.json --minor && git add package.json && git commit -m 'Bump version' && git push origin master && git push gh master:main
scripts.release:patch: npx json-bump package.json --patch && git add package.json && git commit -m 'Bump version' && git push origin master && git push gh master:main
scripts.bump:mayor: npx json-bump package.json --mayor && git add package.json && git commit -m 'Bump version' && git push origin master
scripts.bump:minor: npx json-bump package.json --minor && git add package.json && git commit -m 'Bump version' && git push origin master
scripts.bump:patch: npx json-bump package.json --patch && git add package.json && git commit -m 'Bump version' && git push origin master
